assignment.name: For : 3) Sum of even/odd in a range

files.name: main.py
files.content:
numberOne = int( input("Starting number? "))
numberTwo = int( input("Ending number? "))
total = 0
print ("")

#While Loop
while (True):                                                   
  if (numberOne >= numberTwo):
    print ("Ending number must be greater than", numberOne)
    numberTwo = int(input("Ending number? "))
  elif (numberTwo > numberOne):
    print ("")
    print ("In the range", numberOne, "to", numberTwo) 
    break

totalEven = 0
totalOdd = 0
countEven = 0
countOdd = 0
for number in range(numberOne, numberTwo + 1):               #For Loop
  if (number == 0): continue
  if (number % 2 == 0):
    countEven = countEven + 1
    totalEven = totalEven + number
  else:
    countOdd = countOdd + 1
    totalOdd = totalOdd + number

print ("There are", countEven, "even numbers with a sum of", totalEven)
print ("There are", countOdd, "odd numbers with a sum of", totalOdd)
